name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE, BUREAU OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee, v. COUNCIL 13, AMERICAN FEDERATION OF STATE, COUNTY AND MUNICIPAL EMPLOYEES, AFL-CIO, by Gerald W. McENTEE, Its Trustee Ad Litem, et al., Appellants
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth, Department of Justice v. Council 13, American Federation of State, County & Municipal Employees

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE, BUREAU OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee, v. COUNCIL 13, AMERICAN FEDERATION OF STATE, COUNTY AND MUNICIPAL EMPLOYEES, AFL-CIO, by Gerald W. McENTEE, Its Trustee Ad Litem, et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Kristen Brown, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1348
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE, BUREAU OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee, v. COUNCIL 13, AMERICAN FEDERATION OF STATE, COUNTY AND MUNICIPAL EMPLOYEES, AFL-CIO, by Gerald W. McENTEE, Its Trustee Ad Litem, et al., Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 19, 1982.
Decided Dec. 15, 1982.
Richard Kirschner, Philadelphia, for appellants.
Kristen Brown, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
